import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" function CountryItem(props) { let item = props.state_arr[0]; // let item = props.item; // let url=`https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m8!1m3!1d4250081.265934835!2d${item.latlng[1]}!3d${item.latlng[0]}!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x0%3A0x0!2zMzHCsDMwJzAwLjAiTiAzNMKwNDUnMDAuMCJF!5e1!3m2!1sen!2sil!4v1595918503254!5m2!1sen!2sil` console.log("state", item); return (

{item.name}

populatio: {item.population}
Region: {item.region}
Lenguage: {item.languages[0].iso639_2}, {item.languages[0].name}
Coin: {item.currencies[0].code}, {item.currencies[0].name}
Capital: {item.capital}
{/* https://www.google.com/maps/place/31.5,34.75/@31.5,34.75,7z/data=!3m1!1e3 */} "

States with borders

{ props.setName(item.borders[0]) }} to="/">{item.borders[0]}, { props.setName(item.borders[1]) }} to="/">{item.borders[1]}, { props.setName(item.borders[2]) }} to="/">{item.borders[2]}, { props.setName(item.borders[3]) }} to='/'>{item.borders[3]}
) } export default CountryItem
